title: Did an infectious disease specialist write: " I am not afraid of COVID-19 '?
subtitle: The readers inquired about a viral Facebook publication in the midst of the outbreak of the new Corona virus in 2020.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Dr. Abdou Sharqawi, a specialist in infectious diseases, wrote a viral warning on Facebook about loss of mind in the face of panic about the new Corona virus in 2020.
